altTitles.en: I'm an Evil Woman, so Can I Die Now?
I'm a Villainess, Can I Die?

altTitles.pt-br: Eu sou uma vilã, então posso morrer agora?

altTitles.es: La villana quiere morir otra vez
Incluso si renací, quiero morir de nuevo

altTitles.ja-ro: Akujo wa Mata Shi wo Erabu

altTitles.zh: 我是反派，死了也没关系吗?

altTitles.th: ลิขิตชีวิตนางร้าย

description.en:
“I was reborn… and I want to die again.”

Despite choosing to die in her previous life, our protagonist is reborn as Selena, the short-lived villainess from a novel. The character Selena was written to be so villainous she spends her final moments isolated in a dungeon. But our reincarnated protagonist has no will to live anyway, so she might as well jump (again) and save Selena from her predetermined miserable fate. But when Selena’s family and a knight prevent her from dying, what can she do…?

---
My sick sibling has passed away, so I don't want to live anymore. With that, I chose to end my life, but how did I become a villainess in a novel?! Facing with such a miserable end, I thought I could end this troubled life with my own hands… But why are they still trying to save me?

"Don't deprive me of your partner status, Selina."

"Can you dare to be greedy?"

My life is getting better and better, but the death day is also getting nearer. What do I have to do?

---
[Original Novel](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.nhn?productNo=6327781)

description.es:
Mi hermana enferma murió por lo que mi utilidad ha terminado. Con eso elijo morir, pero ¡¿me convertí en una villana en una novela de tercera categoría?! Ante el miserable final, pensé que podía acabar con esta problemática, llevándome mi vida con mis propias manos… Pero, ¿ ¿Por qué siguen intentando salvarme?

"No me quites tu estatus de pareja, Serena."

"¿Pue des atreverte a ser codicioso?"

Mi vida es cada vez mejor y el día en que moriré se acerca. ¿Qué tengo que hacer?

---
